show_name: Digimon Savers the Movie - Ultimate Power! Burst Mode Invoke!!
other_title: Digimon Savers the Movie - Ultimate Power! Activate Burst Mode!!
Digimon Savers the Movie Kyuukyoku Power! Burst Mode Hatsudou!! (Japanese)
Digimon Savers: Ultimate Power! The Burst Mode in Motion!
デジモンセイバーズ THE MOVIE 究極パワー！バーストモード発動！！ (Japanese)
數碼寶貝 究極力量！爆裂模式發動 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: The human world has been attacked by an unknown force. Using poisoned thorns, it has put all humans to sleep. Agumon, Gaomon and Lalamon are the only ones left to defeat this enemy. Guided by Rhythm,a young girl they saved, they learn that their enemy is called Argomon. But what can the three digimon do, when they can't even evolve
